name: IOST
intro: Decentralized blockchain network based on next-generation consensus algorithm "Proof of Belief" (PoB)
introduce: IOST is an decentralised blockchain network based on the next-generation consensus algorithm “Proof of Believability” (PoB).The project launched a public testnet as of June 30, 2018 and a migrated to its mainnet in February 2019.
